DOC.brief_title: Assessment Lipid Lowering Effect Rosuvastatin Compared Atorvastatin Subjects With Coronary Heart Disease
DOC.criteria: 18 year old , establish coronary heart disease previously perform PCI , previous treatment clopidogrel , ongoing statin treatment , LDLC > 2.9 mmol/L , sign informed consent .
